loans.name: Roberto Erasmo

texts.es:
Roberto vive en la ciudad de Imperial, para poder salir adelante trabaja en una pequeña empresa como empleado, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y sobre todo le gusta su trabajo.

Roberto está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá comprar calaminas, palos, clavos, entre otros, lo que le permitirá realizar mejoras en el techo de la vivienda donde habita y poder mejorar su calidad de vida, así el seguirá luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño: “Construir su vivienda de material noble”.
texts.en:
Roberto lives in the city of Imperial, he works as an employee of a small company in order to get ahead. We works around eight hours a day, and he believes he is able to move forward because he is responsible, and above all he likes his job.

Roberto is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because their help will allow him to buy corrugated plates, wood, nails, etc. so that he can improve the roof of his house, thus improving his quality of life. He will continue struggling to achieve his greatest dream: "To build his house out of solid materials".

loans.use: to buy corrugated plates, wood, etc

loans.name: Neida Soledad

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal María Auxiliadora se reúne en La parroquia Sequita, pertenece a Montecristi prospero cantón manabita, lleno de gente trabajadora dedicada y orgullosa de sus raíces, La Sequita es una parroquia donde sus habitantes son gente honesta que solo saben trabajar y dedicarse a sus familias.

En este lugar vive la señora Neida, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos mayores de edad, dos de ellos viven cerca de su casa pero independientemente. El  esposo se dedica a la agricultura. 

Doña Neida al ver que su marido no gana lo suficiente se vio en la necesidad de dedicarse a una actividad que le dejara algo por el bien de todos y es así que se dedico a la cría de pollos y chanchos, ella con la ayuda de su marido construyeron un pequeño corral en el cual crían estos animalitos, los mismos que tiene por espacio de tres a cuatro meses hasta que tengan un peso adecuado, luego  los vende a comerciantes que llegan hasta su casa a comprarle para trasladarlos a otras ciudades. Esto les ayuda mucho ya que el trabajo en el campo escasea pero gracias  a sus ganancias ellos pueden llevar un plato de comida a su mesa.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar alimento y medicinas tanto para pollos y chanchos. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y  le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos.  

Su sueño es tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The "María Auxiliadora" communal bank meets in the parish of Sequita, which is part of Montecristi, a prosperous canton in Manabi, full of hard-working, dedicated people who are proud of their roots. Sequita is a parish whose inhabitants are honest people, who only know how to work and dedicate themselves to their families.

In this place lives Neida, who is 67 years old. She is married, and from this relationship she has four grown children. Two of them live near her house, but independently. Her husband works in agriculture. 

Seeing that her husband's earnings were not sufficient, Neida saw the need to find an activity which would provide something for the well-being of all. Thus, she dedicated herself to raising chickens and pigs. With her husband's help, she constructed a small enclosure in which she raises these animals. They grow for three to four months until they reach an adequate weight, and then she sells them to merchants who come to her house to buy them and take them to other cities. This helps her very much, since work in the countryside is scarce, but thanks to her earnings, she and her husband can put food on the table. 

She will use this loan to buy feed and medicines for both chickens and pigs. She has been in her communal bank since the beginning, and she likes it because of the help provided to her through the loans. 

Her dream is to have good health.

loans.use: to buy feed and medicines for chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 47 years old, married, and has eight children, three of whom are in school.

Geraldine is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Geraldine has been raising pigs for 20 years now and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Geraldine would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Gregoire

texts.en:
Gregoire is 38. He has been working as a farmer for the past 15 years. He is married, with three children. 

With the loan, he would like to buy more fertilizer and quality seeds for use during the production of potatoes. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest for better, future outputs.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). 

Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. 

Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and quality seeds for use during the production of potatoes.

loans.name: Rodelyn

texts.en:
Rodelyn works hard to support three children. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Rodelyn requested a PHP 1800 loan through NWTF, in order to buy a solar lamp. She is getting the solar lamp, because she wants to be able to extend their business hours, even after nightfall, and minimize her use of kerosene.

Rodelyn is aware that by using the solar lamp, she will be saving money. In addition, she will be helping the environment, and reducing health and accident risks to her family.

loans.use: to buy a solar lamp.

loans.name: Julietha

texts.en:
Julietha lives in Kilifi county north of Mombasa, Kenya. Thirty-one years old and married, she has a shop in town that sells mobile phones and accessories. The business has been in existence for the last three years, and the major challenge that she faces are customers who do not pay on time.


Julietha has discovered a new way of raising her income. She wants to start a money transfer business called M-pesa in her shop. Having learned of Milango through friends, she now seeks a loan to set up this new business. The resulting extra income will improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to start an M-pesa business.

loans.name: Jahngir

texts.en:
Jahngir is 46 years of age. He lives in the rural area near Lahore, Pakistan. He is the father of five children and equally responsible for all of them. He is a milkman by profession, and he sells milk in the nearby town. He sells pure and fresh milk; this is the reason he is very famous in his town. Jahngir is poor, so he does not have enough buffaloes to get milk and does not have sufficient funds to buy more buffaloes. He does not even have enough money to maintain the cowshed.

He decided to buy heifers, because a heifer is cheaper than a buffalo and they grow up in a short time. He will feed them in a better way, and he will devote himself fully to the care of the heifers. He hopes they will grow up soon, so he could get milk from them. Therefore, he requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that he could buy heifers in bulk, could grow them up, and could get milk in large quantity. With the profit amount, he will maintain the cowshed and pay back all the installments due on the loan. 

This time Jahngir is very hopeful, that he will earn maximum income and he will successfully change the lives of his family. Jahngir is very thankful to Kiva and to its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy heifers, to grow up for getting milk to sell

loans.name: Nuria Fiorella

texts.es:
Nuria vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa, Nuria para poder salir adelante trabaja en una institución de su ciudad alrededor de 8 horas, asimismo con el fruto de su trabajo solventa los gastos de su hogar y con mucho esfuerzo solventa también los gastos de sus estudios, ya que actualmente estudia la carrera de derecho y se encuentra en el quinto; Nuria cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy responsable y tiene muchas ganas de progresar.

Nuria esta agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo podrá pagar la matrícula, mensualidad de su universidad y de esta manera poder seguir estudiando y luchando para hacer realidad su gran sueño:” Ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Nuria lives in the city of Pucallpa. In order to get ahead, she works in an institution in her city, and with this income she is able pay her household bills and, with a lot of effort, her educational costs too, as she is currently studying law and is in her fifth year. Nuria believes that she is getting ahead because she is very responsible and really wants to progress.

Nuria is grateful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to their support she will be able to pay her registration fees, monthly university fees and so she will be able to continue studying and fighting to make her big dream come true: "to be a great professional".

loans.use: to pay for her registration and monthly fees for university.

loans.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es:
Las 15 integrantes de este comité cuentan con actividades variadas, las señoras se muestran muy agradecidas con la Fundación Paraguaya y Kiva, por la oportunidad de crecimiento que están recibiendo todas, lo que les permitirá crecer, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal.
La señora  Yeni es integrante es casada y vive en su casa con su marido y sus hijas. La Sra. Yeni tiene una despensa en su casa, y comenta que con gran sacrificio y esfuerzo pudo montarla y que hoy en día tiene una buena clientela que siempre compra de ella los insumos de primera necesidad que vende y el crédito que solicita lo quiere invertir en la compra de productos para su negocio, como ser bebidas, comestibles, enlatados, verduras y golosinas para surtir el negocio y seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The 15 members of this group are engaged in various business activities.  The women are very grateful to the Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the growth opportunity that they are all receiving.  This opportunity will allow them to grow not just financially, but also personally.

Yeni is a member, and she is married.  She lives with her husband and her daughters.  Yeni has a store at her house.  She says that she was able to establish it with great sacrifice and effort.  She now has a good clientele who always buy basic needs supplies from her. 

She wants the loan that she is requesting to buy products for her business.  She will buy things like drinks,  groceries, canned goods, and candy in order to stock the business and continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy drinks,  groceries, canned goods, and candy.

loans.name: Silvana Marlene

texts.es:
Silvana es una joven de 19 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica y es una joven con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Día a día trabaja como vendedora en un puesto de venta de ropa y con los ingresos de su humilde trabajo solventa sus gastos de estudio, ya que actualmente se encuentra en la universidad, ella cree que está saliendo adelante porque es responsable y quiere ser el orgullo de su familia.

Silvana gracias al apoyo de los prestamistas kiva podrá solventar el pago de la mensualidad de su universidad y de esta manera podrá seguir estudiando y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Ser una gran profesional”.
texts.en:
Silvana is a young 18 year old and lives in the city of Ica and really wants to get ahead. Day to day she works selling clothes on a stall and with the income she earns from this humble work she pays her educational costs since she is currently studying at university. She believes that she is getting ahead because she is responsible and she wants to make her family proud.

Thanks to the support of Kiva lenders, Silvana will be able to pay her monthly fees and so be able to continue studying and fighting to make her biggest dream come true: "to be a great professional".

loans.use: to pay her monthly university fees.

loans.name: Aleth

texts.en:
Aleth, a 36-year-old married mother of five children, four of whom are in school, is a very hardworking entrepreneur. For 17 years now, she has operated a fishing business in the Philippines.  


Aleth has requested a PHP 8000 loan amount through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Behruz

texts.ru: Бехрузу всего 20 лет. Он проживает в районе Хуросон. Уже 3 года он большую часть времени проводит на скотном дворе. Бехруз творческая личность. В свободное от работы время, он подрабатывает оператором. Бехруз считает, что съемка свадебных мероприятий это интересная работа, но основной вид его деятельности является животноводство. Несмотря на свой юный возраст, он хочет развить свой бизнес и идти по жизни с этим бизнесом. Он берет кредит для развития своего дела. Бехруз старательный и очень ответственный молодой человек. Мы надеемся, он достигнет желаемого.
texts.en:
Behruz is 20 years old. He lives in the Khuroson region. He has spent the larger part of his time at the cattle yard for three years already. Behruz is a creative person. In his free time he works part-time as a cameraman. Behruz thinks that filming weddings is interesting work, but his main form of business is livestock breeding.

Despite his young age, Behruz would like to expand his business and go through life in this business. He takes a loan to develop his business. Behruz is a diligent and responsible young man. We hope he achieves what he desires.

loans.use: to purchase two cows

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина торгует одеждой. Благодаря предыдущему КИВА кредиту она смогла увеличить товарооборот и полуичть дополнительную прибыль. Недавно Ирина с мужем купили дом. Они смогли переехать, но дом нуждается в ремонте.
В первую очередь Ирина хочет утеплить дом - установить новый отопительный котел, вставить входные и межкомнатные двери. Ирини просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 24,000 гривен.
texts.en: Irina sells clothing.  Thanks to Kiva's previous loan, she was able to increase her goods turnover and make an additional profit.  Recently, Irina and her husband bought a house.  They were able to move, but the house needs repairs.  First, Irina wants to warm up the house by installing a new heating boiler and putting in entry and room doors.  Irina is requesting a loan in the amount of 24,000 hryvnia.

loans.use: to repair a house

loans.name: Ziedali

texts.ru: Шахритус не большой район, где все друг друга знают. В этом районе живут трудолюбивые люди и один из них Зиёдали. Зиёдали как и большинство людей родного района хочет заняться животноводством  - разведением быков. В Шахритусе почти у каждой семьи есть скот во дворе. Дед и отец Зиёдали были пастухами, и он хочет быть похоже на них. Сумму от кредита он потратит на приобретения крупнорогатого скота. Он собирается держать их в коровнике, который достался от отца. Зиёдали ответственный и начитанный молодой человек, ему 28 лет. Он собирается купить быков на базаре. У него есть немного денег, которых он собрал от предоставления услуги, маршрутное такси. Но собственного капитала ему не хватает. Надеемся, что кредит ему поможет, и его отец и дед будут гордиться им.
texts.en: Shahrituz is a small district, where everyone knows each other.  Hardworking people live in this district and one of them is Ziedali.  Ziedali, just like the majority of people in his native district, wants to get involved in animal husbandry - raising bulls.  Almost every family in Shahrituz has livestock in their yards.  Ziedali's grandfather and father were shepherds, and he wants to be like them.  He will spend the loan amount to buy cattle.  He plans to keep them in a cowshed, left from his father.  Ziedali is a responsible and well-read young person.  He is 28 years old.  He plans to buy bulls at a market.  He has some money that he saved from providing a taxi service, but his own capital is not enough.  We hope that this loan will help him, and that his father and grandfather will be proud of him.

loans.use: to buy bulls in order to start his own business

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos es hijo único, está estudiando la carrera de Administración de Empresas, y de esa forma poder salir adelante, ya que quiere ser un gran profesional.
Quiere poder ayudar a su mama, quien es su inspiración para poder salir adelante. Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y así seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Marcos is an only child. He is studying Business Administration so that he can move ahead, because he wants to be a great professional.

He wants to be able to help his mother, who is his main inspiration to move forward. He is applying for this loan to pay his university fees so that he can continue studying.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Zulpuya

texts.ru: Зулпуе 50 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. У Зулпуи - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Зулпуя занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 5,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Зулпуи, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 бык и 1 теленок. Ежемесячный доход составляет 3,500 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Зулпуя обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Зулпуя планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины
texts.en:
Zulpuya is 50 years old, married and raises five children together with her husband. Zulpuya has secondary education. As a main income for her family, Zulpuya works with cattle breeding, after having started 9 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 5,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Zulpuya's persistent work, her farm currently has one dairy cow, one bull and one calf. The monthly income is 3,500 som (KGS).

With an aim to further develop her business, Zulpuya turned to the microfinance bank "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of bull-calves for fattening and reselling at the market at a higher price. Zulpuya plans to invest the income from the loan in further increasing the number of household animals.

loans.use: to buy bull-calves

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es una persona muy trabajadora, a través de su negocio es que esta ayudando a su familia, y dándoles todo lo que tiene al alcance, ella quiere seguir creciendo y es por eso que solicito su crédito anterior, el cual invirtió en la compra de gaseosas, leche, panificados, verduras y productos de limpieza, lo que le ayudo a seguir ofreciendo buena variedad de productos.
Hoy solicita de un nuevo crédito, el cual quiere invertir en la compra de verduras, frutas, panificados y demás, con lo cual podrá seguir luchando y dando un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Francisca is a very hard-working person. Through her business she helps her family, giving them everything they need. She wants to continue growing and this is why she asked for her previous loan which she invested in buying soft drinks, milk, baked goods and cleaning products. This helped her to continue offering a good variety of merchandise.

Now she is asking for a new loan, which she will invest in buying fruit, vegetables, baked goods etc. This means that she will be able to continue fighting, and offer good service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, fruits, baked goods etc.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, vive con su familia, además de eso comenta que trabaja en el negocio de la familia. Dice que dentro de un tiempo se ve como un Ingeniero recibido.
Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería Informática, y le gustaría ser un gran profesional que sea útil, no solo a sí mismo, sino también a los demás.
El solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la cuota de su universidad, para que así siga estudiando y de esa forma estar cada vez más cerca de su meta.
texts.en:
Alfredo is from the city of San Ignacio.  He lives with his family, and he also comments that he works in the family business.  He says that within a reasonable amount of time he will have his engineering degree.

He is studying for a degree in computer engineering.  He would like to be a great professional who is useful not only to himself but also to others.  

He is requesting this loan to be able to make his payment to the university.  This way he will continue studying and getting closer and closer to his goal.

loans.use: to make his payments to the university

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es:
Rocio es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, comenta que trabaja en el negocio familiar ayudando a su  madre y al padre.
Su meta es recibirse y ejercer su profesión de Abogada y también así ayudar a las personas que puedan contar con sus servicios. Le inspira su padre que es una persona muy sacrificada y ve lo mucho que se sacrifica para que ella pueda estudiar.
El solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en pagar las cuotas de su universidad, y así poder estar cada vez más cerca de cumplir su objetivo y de convertirse en un profesional.
texts.en:
Rocío is from the city of Paraguarí. She says that he works in the family business helping her mother and father.
Her goal is to get her law degree and work as a lawyer, and in this way help people who can use her services. She is inspired by her father, who is a very selfless person, and she sees how much he sacrifices so that she can study.
She is requesting this loan to pay her university expenses, and therefore be able to get closer to her objective of becoming a professional.

loans.use: to pay for university expenses.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramon viene de una Familia humilde, el quiere llegar a ser un buen profesional con una visión amplia, las aspiraciones que tiene es vivir de su profesión y mantener a toda su familia con el fruto de su conocimiento.
Está estudiando la carrera de escribanía, y también ya es abogado, y con esas dos carreras podrá ampliar su conocimiento y seguir creciendo.
El solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de manutención, transportación y de sus cuotas y de esa forma poder estudiar y llegar a su objetivo que es ser un gran profesional.
texts.en:
Ramon comes from a humble family. He wants to become a great professional with a broad view. His goals are to make a living from his profession and to provide for his entire family with the fruits of his knowledge.

He is studying for a degree to become a notary, and he is already a lawyer. With these two degrees, he will be able to expand his knowledge and continue growing.

He has applied for a loan to invest in his living and transportation expenses and his university fees. He will then be able to continue studying and achieve his goal of becoming a great professional.

loans.use: to pay his living and transport expenses and his university fees.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en: Vivian is single and has 2 children.  After successfully graduating from junior high school, Vivian is now an established hair dresser. She operates this beauty salon in Ebubonku, a sub-town in Abura (near Cape Coast).  She has been actively involved in this business for about eight years.  As the sole breadwinner in the family,  Vivian uses her income to provide for the entire family.  Vivian  will use the loan to purchase increased amounts of hair dryers, hair extensions, and hair cream, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales. With the new profits from her expanded business, Vivian plans to diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer preferences.

loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of hair dryers, hair extensions, and hair cream, thus aiding her to improve her overall sales.

loans.name: Mgandi

texts.en:
Mgandi appreciates the previous loan he took from Kiva that enabled him to stock his business, and thus, he generated profits he used to improve his living standards.

He is requesting a loan of 10,000 Kenyan shillings to purchase cooking oil, soap, beans and maize for his business. He joined Yehu to access the loan funds.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, soap, beans and maize for his business.

loans.name: Navruzbek

texts.ru:
Наврузбеку 31 год. Он отец двоих детей, верный муж и начинающий бизнесмен. Он хочет открыть свой бизнес по купле и продаже скотов в районе Пяндж. Основной вид деятельности людей на районе это животноводство или растениеводство. Климат  в этом районе благотворно влияет на сельхозные производства. Пользуясь тем, что Наврузбек живет в таком районе Таджикистана, он собирается начать свой бизнес. Он хочет сам работать и обеспечить свою семью. В данный момент бюджет семьи пополняет его жена. Она продает разную одежду на рынке. 
Наврузбек берет кредит для закупа нескольких голов бычков и двух коров. С помощью этого кредита он сможет начать свою деятельность, укрепить бизнес и накопить денег для чтобы дети смогли получить необходимое образования в городе.
texts.en: Navruzbek is 31 years old.  He is a father of two children, a loyal husband and a novice businessman.  He wants to open his own business in buying and selling livestock in the Pyandj district.  Animal husbandry and agriculture are the primary types of business for people in this district.  The climate in this district is suitable for agriculture.  Using the fact that Navruzbek lives in this district of Tajikistan, he is planning to start his own business.  He wants to work himself and provide for his family.  Currently, his wife fills the family's budget.  She sells various clothing at a market.  Navruzbek is requesting this loan to buy several heads of bulls and two cows.  With the help of this loan, he would be able to start his business, strengthen it and save money for his children to obtain good education in the city.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to start his own business

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Due to difficult circumstances Ama did not have access to any formal education, yet this has not stopped her from achieving her dream of becoming an entrepreneur. Currently,  Ama sells cone dough in Kufur (near Cape Coast). She has been doing so for about  five years. As a widow with  two  children, Ama uses all her income to feed and provide for her family.  Ama will use the loan to purchase an increased amount of cone dough, which will aid her in improving her overall sales. Ama wants to use the future profits from her expanded business to ensure that both her children are able to receive an education.

loans.use: to purchase an increased amount of cone dough

loans.name: Manos Emprendedoras Group

texts.es:
16 son las mujeres de este grupo, están en su primer ciclo, con gran entusiasmo de poder mejorar sus vidas. Una de las integrantes la Sra. Otilia, quien se dedica al comercio, es decir que es dueña de una Despensa en su casa, la cual con mucho esfuerzo y sacrificio pudo montar, ella solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para su despensa, como ser carne,verduras, bebidas, y así seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad a sus clientes y seguir luchando por su familia.
Agradece por la oportunidad que reciben de formar parte del comité el cual les será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
There are 16 women in this group, who are in their first loan cycle with a great enthusiasm for improving their lives. One member is Señora Otilia, who works in business - that is, she runs a grocery store from her home which she was able to set up with a lot of effort and sacrifice. She is asking for this loan so that she can invest the money in buying supplies for her grocery store, such as meat, vegetables and drinks, and so continue to offer a wide variety to her customers, and also to continue fighting for her family.

She is grateful for the opportunity she has gotten being part of the committee which has been a great help.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables and drinks.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Hector tiene como meta poder salir adelante e ir mejorando su vida por medio de sus estudios, es por eso que se dedica mucho para poder ser un excelente profesional. Está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería en Informática.
Es una persona dedicada y estudiosa. Solicita de este crédito para poder usarlo en el pago de las cuotas de su facultad. Agradece por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, de ir mejorando su vida a través de sus estudios.
texts.en:
Hector's goal is to move ahead and to improve his life through his studies. Therefore, he works very hard so that he can be an excellent professional. He is studying a degree in computer engineering. 

He is a hardworking and studious person. He is applying for this loan to pay his university fees. He is grateful for the opportunity which he is receiving to improve his life with this degree.

loans.use: to pay his university fees.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, ella quiere independizarse, estudiar y ser una gran profesional. Su meta es ser una profesional destacada  y ser una persona de bien, y así poder ayudar a los más necesitados
Está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, con lo que quiere ser útil a la sociedad, y poder ayudar a la gente. Solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus clases, y demás gastos que surjan en la carrera, para que así no tenga que preocuparse por ello y seguir estudiando.
Esta agradecido por la oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Mercedes is from the city of Paraguarí. She wants to become independent and study to become a great professional. Her goal is to become a distinguished professional and a good person, as well as to help the needy.

She is studying a degree in nursing, with which she hopes she will be useful to society by having the ability to help people. She is applying for this loan to pay for her classes and other fees associated with her degree, so that she can continue studying without worrying about the fees. She is grateful for the opportunity she is being given.

loans.use: to pay for her university classes.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru:
В одном из магазинов Яванского района, Замира работает продавщицей. Ей 36 лет, шесть лет своей жизни она провела в продуктовом магазине, продавая макароны, конфеты, жвачки, чай и разные продукты. Замире продукты привозят из города Душанбе. Она сама не может поехать, так как у нее шестеро детей, которых она не оставит одних. Поставкой продуктов занимается ее муж. 
Замира берет кредит для того чтобы ее муж смог привести муку для продажи. Потому что в Яване принято, чтоб каждая хозяйка умела печь традиционный хлеб. Из за этого спрос на муку большой. Таким поступком Зимира облегчить жизнь многим яванским жителям.
texts.en: Zamira works as a salesperson at one of the stores in the Yavan district.  She is 36 years old and spent six years of her life at a food store, selling pasta, candy, gum, tea and other products.  Zamira gets her products delivered from Dushanbe.  She cannot travel to get them herself because she has six children, whom she cannot leave alone.  Her husband is involved in delivering the products.  Zamira is requesting this loan so that her husband could deliver flour for sale.   It is customary in Yavan that every hostess can bake traditional bread, and this is why the demand for flour is high.  This is how Zamira would make life easier for many Yavan residents.

loans.use: to purchase flour

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco tiene 55 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la elaboración de casas y otras obras, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo madera, cemento y clavos, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Francisco, age 55, lives in the Tortorani  community in the Paucartambo province.  He is a hard-working, enterprising person.  He gets his family ahead with the effort of his work.  His financial activity is building houses and other works.  He is a responsible person, and that is why they invited him to join the Colque Orcco communal bank.

He now needs the loan to buy work materials like wood cement and nails.  He is grateful for and values the loan.  He pledges to make his monthly payments very responsibly

loans.use: to buy work materials like wood cement and nails.

loans.name: Mujeres Alpha (Alpha Women) Group

texts.en:
This group has been formed by six women and is located in the subdivisión “El Compromiso” in the municipality of Mazatenango, department of Suchitepéquez (154 kms./95.6 miles from the city of Guatemala).  

Despite the fact that most of the families within this area are extremely poor and without drinking water, spirits are high and people are encouraged that hard work will help them to survive and prosper.  The six women of this group are very dynamic and are determined to give their best each day to bring food to their tables and meet the needs of their families.

Some of these women work in the morning cleaning houses or washing other people´s clothes, and then devote their afternoons to their own businesses. They are involved in businesses including the sale of used American clothes, drinking water, food, catalogues, other Mexican products, as well as tortillerías.

Catarina’s story is a difficult one to share. She is a 52 year old married woman, (2nd from the right in the photo) who does not know how to read or write. Her two grown daughters and their children are currently living with her due to extremely unfortunate situations.  They are determined to focus on Catarina´s business, which sells grilled corn on a stick and tortillas. They hope to add the sale of chicken for increased revenue.

With her loan, Catarina plans to buy live chickens to sell for meat. She will also use a portion of the loan to purchase wood and corn in bulk, as well as a weight for measuring her products. Her actual profit is Q3,830 (US$497) and her projection is to increase her sales by 29% which will produce a monthly profit of Q4,975 (US$646). She’ll use her earnings to continue helping her two daughters, three grandchildren, and to contribute to household expenses.

loans.use: to buy chickens, wood, and corn in bulk to increase her profits

loans.name: Juan Dionicio

texts.es: Francisco tiene 60 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura y siembra diferentes productos como por ejemplo papa, cebada, trigo y otros más, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abono, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Francisco is 60 years old and lives in the community of Totorani in the Paucartambo province.  He is a hardworking and entrepreneurial person who with his work ethic is getting his family ahead.  He works in agriculture and plants various products such as potatoes, barley, wheat and others.  

Francisco is a responsible person which is why he was invited to participate in the "Colque Orcco" communal bank.  He is seeking this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.  He is grateful for and values the loan and is committed to adhere to the monthly repayment schedule.

loans.use: purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Efua

texts.en: Efua is married with 2 children. She has received some schooling.  Currently, Efua sells cassava and plantains in Ebubonku, a sub town in Abura (near Cape Coast). She has been involved in this industry for about 20 years now. Her husband is a driver.  Efua's income goes towards helping her husband pay for the family's general expenses.  Efua will use the loan to increase her existing cassava and plantain capacity. With the new profits from her expanded enterprise,  Efua plans to develop her business further by venturing into newer markets.

loans.use: to increase her existing cassava and plantain capacity.

loans.name: Khursand

texts.ru: Хурсанд начинающий бизнесмен. Он хочет заняться своим бизнесом, открыть бильярдный клуб, состоящий из одного стола. Хурсанд ответственный и в себе уверенный молодой человек. Он мог бы подождать и сначала закончить универ, но он женат и уже имеет троих детей, несмотря на свой юный возраст. Ему 29 лет. Его жена домохозяйка и раньше нигде не работала. Хурсанд очень любит свою семью и не хочет с ней расставаться. Он учится в городе. Благодаря полученного кредита Хурсанд сможет открыть свой бизнес в родном городе Хамадони и быть ближе к своей семье. И после окончания учебы ему не придется искать работу в городе. Он делает все возможное для выполнения всех потребностей членов его семьи. И у него должно все получится.:)
texts.en: Khursand is a beginner businessman.  He wants to start his own business and open a billiard club, consisting of one table.  Khursand is a responsible and confident young man.  He could have waited and first finished university, but he is married and already has three children, despite his young age.  He is 29 years old.  His wife is a homemaker and has not worked before.  Khursand loves his family very much and does not want to leave them.  He studies in the city.  Thanks to this loan, Khursand would be able to open his own business in his native city of Hamadoni and get closer to his family.  And after finishing university, he would not have to look for work in the city.  He does everything possible for fulfilling all the needs of all of his family members.  And everything should work out for him :)

loans.use: to purchase a billiard table

loans.name: Sandra Viqui

texts.es: Sandra tiene 45 años de edad y es madre soltera de dos hijos. Gran parte de su vida productiva la ha dedicado a vender mercancía a crédito, que la compra en la ciudad de Bogotá y, con ello genera los recursos suficientes para solventar las necesidades familiares, ya que toda la carga económica recae sobre ella por ser madre cabeza de hogar. La cliente es una mujer pujante, perseverante, activa y trabajadora, se proyecta hacia el cumplimiento de sus objetivos, especialmente el de hacer crecer su negocio hasta convertirlo en una distribuidora y en un futuro a mediano plazo, poder adquirir su casa propia. Sandra es consciente que para lograr sus metas debe luchar con esfuerzo, dedicación y entrega y, por ello se anima a solicitar el crédito, pues es un apoyo para continuar realizando su actividad, este lo desea invertir en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (perfumería, cremas corporales, utensilios de cocina, ropa, entre otros), de esta forma podrá ampliar la variedad de inventario disponible para ofrecer a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y por ende los ingresos con los cuales desea dar un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra, 45, is a single mother of two. She has spent a large part of her life selling merchandise on credit. She buys the merchandise in Bogotá. With this work, she earns enough to cover her family's needs. The family's financial burden falls on her as the head of the household. She is a strong, persevering, active, hardworking woman who focuses on achieving her goals, especially that of growing her business. She wants to become a distributor, and in the medium-term, she also wants to own her own house.

Sandra realizes that she has to work hard with effort, dedication, and sacrifice to achieve her goals. Therefore, she decided to apply for this loan for support as she continues with her business. She would like to invest in the purchase of wholesale merchandise (perfume, body creams, kitchen utensils, and clothing, among others). She will then be able to expand the variety of her inventory to offer her clients, which will allow her to increase her sales and therefore her earnings. With this income, she hopes to provide her family with better well-being and a greater quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale merchandise (perfume, body creams, kitchen utensils, and clothing, among others).

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es: Ernesto tiene 48 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura y cultiva papa, hortalizas y vegetales, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abono, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Ernesto is 48 years old and lives in the community of Torotrani in the Paucartambo province.  He is a hardworking and entrepreneurial man who with his work ethic is getting his family ahead. He works in agriculture and grows potatoes and vegetables.

He was invited to participate in the "Colque Orcco" communal bank because he is a very responsible person.  He is seeking this loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer.  He is very grateful for and values the loan, and he is committed to adhering to the monthly repayment schedule.

loans.use: purcahse seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es: Daniel tiene 48 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura y el engorde ganado, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar alimento como forraje y concentrados, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Daniel, age 48, lives in the Tortorani  community in the Paucartambo province.  He is a hard-working, enterprising person.  He gets his family ahead with the effort of his work.  His financial activity is farming and fattening livestock.  He is a responsible person,  and that is why they invited him to join the Colque Orcco communal bank.

He now needs the loan to buy food like fodder and concentrated feed.  He is grateful for and values the loan.  He pledges to make his monthly payments very responsibly

loans.use: to buy food like fodder and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Hipolito

texts.es: Hipolito tiene 32 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura y la crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Hipolito is 32 years and lives in the community of Totorani in the province of Paucartambo.  He is a hardworking and entrepreneurial person who is getting his family ahead through his work ethic.  He works in agriculture and raises small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.  

He is a responsible person, which is why he was invited to join the "Colque Orcco" communal bank.  He is seeking this loan to purchase guinea pigs.  He is very grateful for and values this loan, and is committed to adhering to the monthly repayment schedule.

loans.use: purchase guinea pigs

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 40 years old; she lives in the community surrounding Airport, Liberia. She stopped her education at 9th grade, and she is married and has children between 16 and 20 years old. They are living with her and going to school. 

For the past ten years she has been selling rice and bread in the market. A problem that she faces is the rainy season. She likes her business because it provides for her needs. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice and bread for her business. 

Her plans are to send her children to college and build her house.

loans.use: to purchase rice and bread for her business.

loans.name: Existosas Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento EXISTOSAS, Está  compuesto por ocho integrantes todas mujeres, los integrantes del grupo se dedican a distintas actividades  la presidenta del banco es la Sra. Celida en la foto es la que tiene la blusa café, tiene 31 años tiene dos hijos de las edades de 8,  y 12 años,  su actividad es la venta de refrigerios y sándwich en su puesto de venta, la Sra. Celida se levanta desde tempranas horas de la mañana para elaborar sus sándwich y también para prepara el almuerzo para su familia, después sale a vender todo esto por la mañana, con el dinero del crédito la Sra. Celida comprara insumos para la elaboración de sus refrigerios, la Sra. Celida es una persona responsable y trabajadora esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo económico que le brinda para tener una mejor calidad de vida y seguir adelante superándose por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en: The communal bank "EXISTOSAS" is composed of eight members, all of them women. The group's members work in different activities. The bank's president is Ms. Celida, who in the photo is wearing a brown blouse. She is 31 years old and has two children, aged 8 and 12. Her work is selling sandwiches and packed lunches from her sales stand. Celida gets up early in the morning to prepare her sandwiches and also to make lunch for her family. After this, she goes out to sell her products during the morning. With the funds from the loan, Celida will buy supplies to prepare her packed lunches. Celida is a responsible and hard-working person. She is grateful to the institution for the economic support provided to her so that she can have a better quality of life and continue getting ahead for the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare the packed lunches she sells.

loans.name: Quintin Americo

texts.es: Americo tiene 32 años de edad y vive en la comunidad de Totorani en la provincia de Paucartambo, él es una persona trabajadora y emprendedora que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo entonces su actividad económica es la agricultura, él es una persona responsable por ese motivo le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal “Colque Orcco” y en esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar fertilizantes y semillas, él agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en: Americo is 32 years old and lives in the community of Totorani, in the province of Paucartambo. He is a hard-working and enterprising person who is helping his family get ahead through his work and effort. His economic activity is farming. He is a responsible person, and for this reason he was invited to participate in the “Colque Orcco” communal bank. On this occasion, he needs the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. He is grateful and appreciates the loan, and he is committed to making his monthly payments in a very responsible manner.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Sidi

texts.en: Sidi lives in Malindi, Kenya. She is 25 years old and married with four children. For the last three years her main economic activity has been selling fried fish in the local market. This business is her sole source of income and she works everyday to make sure that it succeeds. She found out about Milango through friends and decided to join so that she could access credit to fund her business. She hopes that in the future she can venture into the retail business and move away from selling fish. She seeks a loan to buy 10 Kgs of fish for sale. The extra income that she will raise from the business will improve her living standards and help her pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy 10 Kgs of fish

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, sugar and beans.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 30 years old and married. His wife is a teacher. He is the father of two children aged four and two, respectively. He is a livestock trader in the area of Mulot in Bomet County, Kenya. He has been running this business for the past 5 years, and he makes a monthly income of 20000 KES. He learned about Kadet from other traders in the market.

Stephen has borrowed a 2nd loan of 30000 KES from KADET after successfully paying off the previous one. Stephen will use the funds to purchase more livestock to fatten and resell at a profit. The anticipated profit will be reinvested to boost business. His future dreams are to improve his living standards and those of his family.

loans.use: to buy livestock for fattening and reselling.

loans.name: Beryl

texts.en:
Beryl is a 31-year-old hardworking lady who is the mother of two children aged ten and six respectively. She has operated a salon in Bomet town for the last three years, making a monthly income of 32,000 KES.

Beryl has applied for a third loan of 40,000 KES after successfully paying back her previous loans. She will use the funds to buy salon assets, hair extensions and weaves for the now very busy salon. She will use the proceeds to refurbish the premise.

Her dream is to own rental houses.

loans.use: to buy salon assets, hair extensions and weaves

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is 32 years old, married to Paul, and they have been blessed with three children of the ages 5, 3 and 1 year old respectively. 

She runs an M-Pesa (mobile phone based money transfer) business and she has been in business for five years. Right now, her monthly income from the business is KES 120,000.

She is borrowing a loan of KES 100,000, which she will use to add float (stored-value credits) to her business. She plans to use the anticipated profits to expand the business. 

This is her third loan and she successfully paid her previous loan.

loans.use: to add float (stored-value credits) to her M-Pesa (mobile phone based money transfer) business.

loans.name: Herine

texts.en:
Herine is 35 years old and supporting a family of four people. She sells fruit and vegetables; she has been in this business for the last three years, with a monthly income of KES 30,000.

Herine has graduated to a second loan with KADET LTD of KES 35,000, with which she plans to purchase more bananas, potatoes, and green vegetables for her business.

With the anticipated profit, she will buy a plot.

Her hopes and dreams are to become a wholesaler and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase bananas, potatoes, and green vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 40 years old and lives in New Kru Town, one of the early communities which is well-known in Liberia. She is married and has four children, ages between 10 and 20, whom are presently in school and live at home. She was unable to attend school.

For the past five years, she has been selling dried fish. She started this business by selling on a market table for her mother, and she learned this way of selling from her friends. She is very happy with her business because she makes a lot of profits, and it keeps her busy. 

She is requesting a loan to buy more dried fish to increase her business. Her plans are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish to increase her business.

loans.name: Magole 'b' Group

texts.en:
LUCAS is in his late 30s and is married with four children, who are still going to school. He has been running a fruits and vegetables business for five years now. He works from 07am to 08pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be LUCAS's 2nd loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to buy the missing fruits and vegetables and has paid back the entire previous loan successfully. He managed to use his business profit to pay school fees and household expenses. LUCAS will use this loan to restock the out of stock fruits and vegetables. Lucas is doing fine with his genge (grocery hut). He dreams that one day he will be able to own a wholesale business. 

LUCAS will share this loan with his loan group "MAGOLE 'B'" which is comprised of 11 members. The members of this group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock the out of stock items in the fruits and vegetables business.

loans.name: Delphine

texts.en:
Delphine is 33 years old. She is married with three children aged between four and twelve. They all go to school. She has been growing potatoes for the past 12 years. With the loan, she would like to buy more fertilizer and quality seeds for use during the production of potatoes. The profits from the business will be used to buy essential equipment for her home.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy more fertilizer and quality seeds to use in the production of potatoes.

loans.name: Francisco Antonio

texts.es:
Francisco de 40 años, solamente estudio hasta 1° grado, no continuo porque para sus padres se les hacia demasiado difícil poderlo mandar, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y tienen 4 hijos y 3 de ellos viven en su casa, de los cuales 2  estudian 7° y 9° grado en la escuela de la comunidad. 

Toda su vida se ha dedicado de lleno a la agricultura, aprendió a trabajar las tierras ya que manifiesta que miraba su padre hacerlo y comenzó a sembrar pequeñas parcelas y con el tiempo s atrevió a sembrar cada vez más.  En ocasiones hace trabajos de albañil en la zona, el cual genera algunas ganancias. Para llegar, a su  terreno donde siembra maíz camina, aproximadamente 15 minutos acompañado en ocasiones de su hijo mayor.

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar abonos y pesticidas; ya que siembra 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz, además tiene una pequeña parcela del cultivo de guineos y plátano y necesita para la compra fertilizantes. 

Espera generar ganancias, que le permita cubrir las necesidades básicas del hogar y seguir dándole el estudio a sus hijos, en un futuro desean ampliar la parcela de los plátanos; para generar un ingreso extra en la venta de hojas del cultivo.
texts.en:
Francisco, 40 years old, only studied until the first grade. He did not continue because it was too difficult for his parents to send him. He is in a relationship, and his partner makes a living through domestic work. They have four children, and three of them live in their house, of which two are studying in the seventh and ninth grades in the community school.

All of his life, he had dedicated himself fully to agriculture. He learned to work the land since he watched his father do so and began to sow small parcels. With time, he dared to sow more and more. Sometimes, he does bricklaying work in the area, which generates some profits. To get to his land where he sows corn, he walks about 15 minutes, sometimes accompanied by his oldest son.

The loan that he is requesting is to buy compost and pesticide, since he sows 10,500 square meters of corn. Furthermore, he has a small parcel of land for banana and plantain crops, and he needs to purchase fertilizers.

He hopes to generate profits that allow him to cover the basic necessities in the home and continue paying for his children’s studies. In the future, they want to increase the land for the plantains to generate extra income from the sale of the crop’s leaves.

loans.use: to buy compost and pesticides, since he sows 10,500 square meters of corn; furthermore, he has a small parcel of land for banana and plantain crops, and he needs to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Jonathan

texts.en: Jonathan is 49 years old and supports a family of three members. He is married to Salina and they are blessed with four children between 23 and 17 years old. He runs a hotel business and also owns a vehicle he operates as a taxi. He has been in operation for the last five years and from these businesses he earns a monthly income of KES 43,000. He has borrowed a loan of KES 73,000 from KADET, which he plans to use to pay the school fees for his children. His dream is that his business will prosper, enabling him to earn maximum profits.

loans.use: To pay the school fees for his children.

loans.name: Dora Gracierla

texts.es: Dora de 59 años de edad habita en la ciudad de Barranquilla, con su cónyuge y su hija de 25 años de edad; allí ofrece servicios de lavandería de ropa, desde el año 2003, cuando una amiga le recomendó la apertura de un negocio de lavado y planchado de cortinas, ropa de cama , manteles etc. Sus principales compras las hace de contado en insumos como detergentes, suavizantes de ropa, lo cual usa en el proceso. Todos los clientes que Dora ha ganado se acercan al local a solicitarle el servicio y ella debe tener toda la disponibilidad posible, para que ellos se sientan bien atendidos y regresen a su negocio, por eso su meta mas adelante es comprar una lavadora industrial, mediante la cual logre incremente la potencialidad de sus ventas, utilidades y obtenga ahorro de tiempo, dinero y trabajo. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará  en un mayor volumen que el acostumbrado, suavizante de ropa y detergentes;  esta inversión logrará hacerla exitosa, porque obtendrá descuentos por volúmenes de compra, impactando una vez mas sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Dora is 59 years old and lives in the city of Barranquilla with her husband and her 25-year-old daughter.  She has been offering laundry services since 2003 after a friend suggested that she open this type of business.  Dora also irons curtains, bed sheets, tablecloths, and other items.  The main supplies that she purchases with cash are detergents and fabric softeners, which are used in the laundry process.  

All of Dora’s customers live near her shop and request her services.  She tries to make herself available as much as possible since it makes her customers feel like they have been well-attended and they will want to return to her business.  For this reason, her goal going forward is to buy an industrial washing machine since this will increase her sales potential and her profits.  It will also save her time, money, and work.  

At the moment, Dora is applying for a Kiva loan, her first form of financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the money to buy a larger volume of fabric softeners and detergents than usual.  This investment will be successful because she will be able to obtain volume discounts, which will have an impact on her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a bulk quantity of fabric softeners and detergent.

loans.name: Montoiya

texts.en:
Montoya is 45 years old and married to Nanetia.  He supports a family of six members. His chidren are between 19 and 6 years of age. 

He is a mixed farmer and has been in the business for the last seven years.  Montoya's monthly income is KES 9,000.

He is currently servicing his fifth loan from KADET of KES 80,000.  It will help him to prepare his land and get planting seedlings. He plans to use the anticipated profits to diversify into livestock farming. 

Montoya's dream is to improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and planting seedlings

loans.name: Santa Librada Group

texts.es:
Santa Librada está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité, donde todas trabajan y se están esforzando al máximo para ir mejorando sus vidas, ellas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 señoras se encuentra por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir con ingresos muy bajos.
Una persona digna de destacar es la Sra. Sofia, quien se dedica a la venta de animales de corral, como ser gallinas y cerdos. Comenta que tiene una buena cantidad de animales que cría y luego vende, es por medio de su esfuerzo que está ayudando a su familia y creciendo. Es una persona muy luchadora, que quiere salir adelante.
Sofia solicita de este crédito para poder invertirlo en la compra de balanceados para sus animales y así seguir con su emprendimiento y luchando.
texts.en:
“Santa Librada” is in its fourth loan cycle with the committee program.  All of the members work and strive to do their best to improve their lives.  The members have taken a poverty elimination survey and the results indicated that six of the women are below the poverty line.  In other words, they have very low incomes. 

One person who is worth mentioning is Sra. Sofia.  She sells farm animals, such as chickens and pigs.  Sofia says that the animals she raises and sells are of good quality.  Through her efforts, she is growing and helping her family.  Sofia is a very determined individual who wants to forge ahead.  She is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of balanced feed for her animals.  This will enable her to keep striving at her business.

loans.use: to buy balanced animal feed.

loans.name: María Adela

texts.es:
María es un mujer de 47 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, razón principal por los escasos recursos económicos, que  tenían sus padres en aquel entonces. Actualmente está acompañada, su pareja se encuentra en los Estados Unidos, tiene 3 hijos y solamente uno vive con ella en su casa y estudia 2 año de bachillerato. 


Toda la vida se ha dedicado a los oficios domésticos, en ocasiones ha lavado y planchado ropa ajena para tener unos ingresos extra; porque principalmente depende de la remesa que le envía su pareja. Además, en su casa tiene una pequeña tienda, lo hace manifiesta para no sentirse aburrida.


El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar bloques, arena, cemento, columnas y pago de mano de obra. Necesita el préstamo, porque quiere levantar el techo de su casa especialmente el de las habitaciones, debido a que en la noche hace demasiado calor.

En un futuro desea, seguir remodelando la casa para dejarles un buen patrimonio a sus hijos, espera también que su hijo siga estudiando para que pueda independizarse en un futuro. Le ayudara el préstamo ya que se sentirá más cómoda en su propio hogar.
texts.en:
María is a 47-year-old woman. She did not have an opportunity to study, the principal reason being the scarce economic resources of her parents at the time. Currently, she is in a relationship, and her partner is in the United States. She has three children, and only one lives with her in her home, studying in his second year of high school.

All of her life, she has made a living through domestic work. Sometimes, she has washed and ironed other people’s clothes to have some extra income because she mainly depends on the money that her partner sends her. Furthermore, in her home she has a small shop, mainly to not be bored.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy blocks, sand, cement, and columns, and to pay labor costs. She needs the loan because she wants to raise the roof of her home, especially above her bedrooms, since at night it is too hot.

In the future she wishes to continue remodeling her home to leave a good inheritance to her children. She also hopes that her son continues studying so that he can become independent in the future. The loan will help her since she will feel more comfortable in her own home.

loans.use: to buy blocks, sand, cement, and columns, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Blanca Nely

texts.es: Blanca es una señora de 57 años de edad,  casada y madre de cinco hijos. Desde hace 5 años comenzó a vender mercancía por catálogo gracias a una amiga que le enseñó a realizar la actividad, sus principales clientes son familiares, amigos y vecinos del sector donde reside; ofrece cremas corporales, shampoo, cremas faciales, entre otros y, con los ingresos que recibe puede aportar a  la economía de su hogar. Algunas veces se le dificulta pagar algunas facturas porque los clientes le incumplen con los pagos, sin embargo ha sabido soprepasar los obstáculos para continuar. Solicita el apoyo del crédito para invertirlo en la compra de mercancía al por mayor (cremas corporales, cosméticos, perfumería, cremas faciales, entre otros) con lo que podrá mejorar sus ventas y aumentar el margen de rentabilidad, ya que puede aprovechar los descuentos, consiguiendo los productos a menor costo, esto le permitirá generar mejores ingresos para seguir velando por el bienestar de su familia. Con su trabajo, Blanca sueña poder seguir avanzando para cumplir el sueño de tener su propio almacén y ahorrar para comprar una casa propia, en la que pueda disfrutar de una mejor calidad de vida y estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Blanca, 57, is a married woman and mother of five children.   She started selling merchandise via catalog five years ago thanks to a friend who taught her how to do this work.  Her main customers are family members, friends and neighbors around the area where she lives.  She offers body creams, shampoo and face creams, among others and uses income earned to contribute to her household economy.

Sometimes it’s difficult to pay some of her bills because her customers don’t make their payments.  However, she’s learned to overcome these obstacles in order to continue.  She’s asking for the loan’s support to buy merchandise at wholesale (body cream, cosmetics, perfumery, face cream, etc.) in order to improve her sales and increase her profit margin because she’ll be able to take advantage of discounts and buy products at a lower cost which will allow her to generate higher income to continue watching over her family’s well-being.

Blanca dreams with being able to use her work to continue moving forward and to reach her dream of owning her own store and to save up to buy a house of her own too where she can enjoy better quality of life and economic stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: pay for labor during the coffee harvest.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es:
La señora Ana tiene 53 años de edad, vive con sus 3 hijos, es viuda, su domicilio está ubicado en la comunidad de Monteagudo. Sus principales actividades de la señora Ana es la crianza de cerdos criollos y  producción de maíz, los cerdos los cría en corrales rústicos y obtiene ingresos cada seis meses de estas actividades.
Ana es una mujer muy trabajadora, es por eso que está solicitando crédito para la compra de insumos agrícola para la siembra de maíz, ya que están en campaña de producción,  de esta manera podrá obtener ingresos de esta actividad y también  cubrirá los gastos de estudios, útiles, ropas y otros de sus 2 hijos que tiene, de esta manera sus hijos lograran  concluir sus estudios hasta salir profesionales y tener una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 53 years old, she lives with her 3 children, she is a widow, and her home is located in the community of Monteagudo. Her primary responsibilities include taking care of pigs and growing corn. She cares for the pigs in old corrals and she is able to earn some money from this activity every six months or so. 
Ana is hard working, and that is why she is asking for this loan. She needs to purchase some supplies so she can plant more corn, because there has been a campaign promoting this produce, and so she hopes to be able to earn some more income. She also needs to cover the cost of school, everyday items, clothing, and other expenses that her 2 children have. By her helping them, her children will be able to finish their schooling and begin professional careers and have a better life.

loans.use: purchase agricultural supplies to plant corn.

loans.name: Flor Del Carmen

texts.es:
Flor de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, no continuo sus estudios por motivos de que se casó, su pareja se dedica a la venta de accesorios como pulseras, cadenas además vende paletas, jugos y agua. Tiene 2 hijos de 7 y 2 años estudian 1° y 4° grado,  y no viven con ella ya que los hijos viven con su madre; porque ella trabaja en una casa de oficios domésticos en la ciudad. 

Después de haber culminado sus estudios, contrajo matrimonio y se dedicó a los oficios domésticos, ya lleva como 4 años sirviendo a la familia que la contrato. Además, se dedica a la venta de artículos por catálogos de diferentes marcas. Viaja los fines de semana de la ciudad hasta la comunidad en donde vive su madre, aproximadamente 1 hora en bus, y los días de semana se queda a dormir donde trabaja. 

El préstamo lo solicita para la reparación del techo de la casa de su madre, ya que se ha quebrado una viga y debido a eso todas las tejas están a punto de colapsar. Cambiará su vida, ya que no tiene que vivir preocupada porque sus hijas andan caminado en el corredor y están susceptibles a que cualquier momento se venga abajo el tejado. 

Su deseo principalmente, es que el techo este en buenas condiciones y pasar más tiempo con sus hijas y seguir dándoles el estudio para que puedan culminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Flor, 27, completed high-school but did not go further because she got married.  Her spouse works selling accessories like bracelets and chains and also sells frozen pops, juice and water.  She has two children who are 7 and 2 years old and attending 1st and 4th grade.  They don’t live with her because they live with her mother because she herself works as a domestic employee in the city.

Having completed her studies and gotten married she started working as a domestic employee and has been working for the family that hired her for about four years.  She also sells products of various brands via catalog.  She travels weekly from the city to the community where her mother lives; it’s a one-hour bus ride approximately and she sleeps weeknights at her place of employment.

The loan she’s asking for is to repair her mother’s roof because a beam broke and the roof tiles are about to collapse.  It will change her life because she won’t be worried any longer that at any moment part of the roof can come crashing down onto her daughters while they are playing in the hallway.

Her main wish is for the roof to be in good condition and to spend more time with her daughters and to continue providing schooling for them so that they can complete their education.

loans.use: to repair her mother's roof.

loans.name: Leila Irene

texts.es: Leila, tiene 48 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive con una hija de las menores en el municipio de Villanueva Cortes. Hace 5 años que estableció su propio negocio de pulpería para obtener sus propios ingresos y poderle dar la manutención a su familia. en la pulpería vende granos básicos, manteca, pan, refrescos, azúcar, harina, productos enlatados, productos de higiene, churros etc. Ella ha solicitado un préstamo por 21,000 Lempiras para surtir el negocio y poder aumentar el inventario y las ganancias, comprara manteca, azúcar, arroz, huevos, churros, refrescos, lácteos y otros para vender. Su meta es crecer como empresaria y ver su negocio surtido.
texts.en:
Leila, 48, is a single mother of three children.  She lives with one of her younger daughters in the municipality of Villanueva, Cortes.  She started her own grocery business five years ago in order to earn her own income and be able to support her family.  She sells basic grains, shortening, bread, soft-drinks, sugar, flour, canned goods, cleaning supplies, snacks, etc. in the grocery store. 

She’s requested a 21,000 Lempira loan to stock the business and increase inventory and profits.  She’ll buy shortening, sugar, rice, eggs, snacks, soft-drinks, dairy products and others to sell.  Her goal is to grow as a businesswoman and to keep her store well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Dúo Fusion Group

texts.es: Dúo Fusión, representado por Irma de 30 años, soltera, quien se dedica a la venta de gas propano en su domicilio desde hace dos años, Irma se vio en la necesidad de crear su propio negocio después de ver que no podía seguir trabajando en una maquila y que conseguir trabajo era más difícil, aparte de vender gas también brinda servicios de sastrería, la gente ya la conoce sus vecinos de igual manera con la venta de gas ya que va a domicilio solo por la zona, espera poder crecer y poder tener su propia casa que es el anhelo que ella tiene para un futuro.
texts.en: The “Fusión” (Fusion) Duo is represented by Irma, 30.  She’s single and has been working selling propane gas from home for the last two years.  Irma had to start her own business because she couldn’t continue any longer employed at an assembly plant and getting another job was more difficult.  Besides selling gas, she also provides tailoring services.  People as well as her neighbors know her from the gas sales because she goes house to house in the zone.  She hopes to be able to grow and to be able to have a house of her own; that’s her dream for the future.

loans.use: to buy propane gas tanks.

loans.name: Dúo Buena Vista Group

texts.es:
Dúo buena vista
Dúo conformado por Marco Vinicio de 22 años de edad se dedica desde hace dos años a la crianza de cerdos. lucha para salir adelante y ha encontrado en su negocios una fuente de ingresos y con ello poder cubrir sus necesidades básicas. Tiene la ventaja que en el área donde vive es propicia y comerciable para esa actividad a que el se dedica. y solicita el crédito para la compra de Cerdos para la crianza, concentrado, vitaminas y desparasitantes, para los mismos.
texts.en: Marco Vinicio, 22, is part of the group Duo Buena Vista. He has been raising pigs for the last two years. He fights to succeed and in his business has found a source of income with which he is able to cover basic needs. He has the advantage of living in an area that is favorable for business. He is requesting this loan to buy pigs for breeding, feed, vitamins and anti-parasite treatment for them.

loans.use: to buy pigs for breeding and food for them.

loans.name: Irma Margarita

texts.es: Irma, tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposo con quien tiene tres hijos y reside en el municipio de Taulabe. Hace 2 años se dedica a la venta de productos de abarrotería como ser productos enlatados, huevos, manteca, refrescos, arroz, azúcar, maíz, frijoles, harina, jabón, etc. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y ya cuenta con buena clientela. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 6,700 Lempiras para poder surtir su negocio de más productos como granos básicos, manteca, refrescos, y churros y satisfacer a sus clientes. Ella tiene previsto invertir las ganancias en reparar su casa para tener mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Irma, 38, is in a common law relationship with her husband and they have three children; she lives in the municipality of Taulabe.  She’s sold grocery items like canned goods, eggs, shortening, soft-drinks, rice, sugar, corn, beans, flour, soap, etc. for two years.  Her store is home-based and she already has a good clientele.

She’s decided to request a 6,700 Lempira loan to be able to stock her store with more products like basic grains, shortening, soft-drinks and snacks to meet customer demand.  She’s planning to invest her profits in home repairs in order to have better conditions.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase and run one 'Fresh Life' toilet

loans.name: Oanh

texts.en:
Oanh, 40, is married and has a daughter. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Oanh has been running a business of making and selling paper containers for 15 years. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying more materials to increase her production of making and selling paper containers.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions and sending her child to school.

loans.use: To buy paper materials to make and sell paper containers.

loans.name: Lan

texts.en:
Lan, 38, is married and has two daughters. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns income through making garments. She is running a business of making and selling fiber and plastic bags. 

She started this business six years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of materials to increase her productions.

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy materials to make fibre and plastic bags.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is the father of three children, one of whom goes to school and two are under school age. He lives in his own house that has no electricity or piped water.

He has operated a retail shop for the past eight years, selling household consumables, like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. 

With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, soap, tea leaves, and wheat flour for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour, soap, tea leaves, and wheat flour for resale.

loans.name: Tiwa

texts.en:
Tiwa is 46 years old and supporting a family of six people. He has been in this business for the last six years, with the monthly income of KES 50,000.
